fpmExplorer:Page.title: Upload Table
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Table building block provides a built-in upload functionality that allows users to upload files to the server.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: 1) Property
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: The entity type must have an Edm.Stream type property that is used to store the uploaded file.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: 2) Line Items
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: The UI.LineItem annotation must contain a reference to the Edm.Stream type property that is used to store the uploaded file.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: 3) Media Resource
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: The entity type must have the UI.MediaResource annotation with the Stream property referencing the Edm.Stream type property that is used to store the uploaded file.
